Please write in [TARGETLANGUAGE]
[PROMPT] 

I am creating a YouTube video that needs a title, hashtags, and tags designed to maximize engagement, rank well in search, and attract a high click-through rate. The video is about [insert topic], targeting [insert audience]. The style is [insert style: informative, entertaining, mysterious, etc.] with the goal of [informing, entertaining, evoking emotion, shocking, etc.]. Please generate 5 titles that are optimized for search, use emotional power words, and create a sense of curiosity, urgency, or fear of missing out. Also, provide 5-10 relevant and high-ranking hashtags and a list of tags that include trending and targeted keywords to improve searchability on YouTube and vidIQ. Focus on making the video stand out in search results while driving views and engagement.
